item_name: Robbie Basho - Visions of the Country (1978)
notes: 2025-01-06. 12-string fingerpicking & piano w intensity, vulnerability. Vibrato-rich mystical vocal. Hypnotic, shimmering
Rock, avant-garde musician, producer, Chicago, active 1989-
2025-01-08 (re-listening). Just stunning & first track goes so hard. Glenn Kotche drums. Lyrics occasionally spiritually damaging
connection_labels: released on Domino (Jim in UK; JB in US)

item_name: Robbie Basho - The Falconer's Arm I (1967)

notes: 2025-01-06. Incredibly mellow. Nice synth key, horn timbres. Night Walk like Blue Nile meets Earthbound OST
2025-01-08. Cool busy programmed drum grooves. Soft vocal. Subtle, relaxed, comfortable

item_name: Horse Jumper of Love - Disaster Trick (2024)
notes: 2025-01-08. Great fuzzy guitar melodies, yearning chord changes. Lyrics sometimes juvenile but in a good way. Recorded in Asheville; Karly & MJ of Wednesday guest

connection_labels: played guitar on|MJ put Forget the Flowers on Spotify playlist

notes: 2025-01-09. On some days my favourite album ever. 19 songs all vital. I'D LIKE TO THANK YOU ALL FOR NOTHING
